actions.text: On agreeing to the Farenthold amendment (A037) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment (A037) offered by Mr. Farenthold to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A037) offered by Mr. Farenthold to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Farenthold amendment (A037) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

description: Amendment allows for certain trucks with current weight exemptions to be allowed to continue riding at those higher weight exemptions once certain segments of Texas State Highways are converted into Interstate 69.
purpose: An amendment numbered 38 printed in Part B of House Report 114-325 to allow for only certain trucks with current weight exemptions to be allowed to continue riding at those higher weight exemptions once certain segments of Texas State Highways are converted into Interstate 69.
